Docs.summary: (Optional) describes the PII categories to which the redaction policy will be applied. If not specified, the redaction policy will be applied to all PII categories.

Docs.summary: (Optional) flag to indicate whether this redaction policy is the default policy to be applied when no specific policy is defined for a PII category. Only one policy can be marked as default.
